employers.title: Demand Generation Marketing Lead, Postmark
employers.description: Leading demand generation strategy and execution for Postmark, a transactional email service within ActiveCampaign. Responsible for driving profitable user acquisition and growth through multi-channel digital marketing campaigns.
achievements: Developed and executed comprehensive digital advertising strategy across Google, Microsoft, and Meta platforms, resulting in 35% increase in qualified leads
Optimized campaign performance through rigorous A/B testing and data analysis, improving conversion rates by 28% and reducing cost per acquisition by 22%
Led cross-functional collaboration with product and sales teams to align marketing initiatives with business objectives and customer needs
Implemented advanced tracking and attribution models to accurately measure campaign performance and ROI across multiple channels

employers.title: Performance Marketing Manager - Team Lead
employers.description: Led performance marketing initiatives and managed a team of digital marketers focused on driving user acquisition and revenue growth for Mailgun's email API services.
achievements: Scaled Google App Campaigns resulting in 45% year-over-year growth in new customer acquisition while maintaining target cost per acquisition
Successfully launched and optimized Microsoft Advertising campaigns, establishing a new profitable acquisition channel that contributed 18% of total lead volume
Developed and implemented creative testing framework for Meta advertising, increasing click-through rates by 32% and reducing cost per click by 24%
Managed $1.2M annual digital advertising budget, consistently achieving ROI targets through strategic allocation and continuous optimization

employers.title: Digital Marketing Manager
employers.description: Managed comprehensive digital marketing strategy including paid search, social media advertising, and email marketing campaigns for an email testing and deliverability platform.
achievements: Restructured Google Ads account architecture and implemented advanced bidding strategies, resulting in 40% improvement in conversion rates
Expanded digital advertising presence to new platforms including LinkedIn and Twitter, diversifying acquisition channels and reducing dependency on single platforms
Collaborated with content team to develop high-converting landing pages and marketing assets, improving overall campaign performance
Implemented comprehensive analytics framework to track user journey from first touch to conversion, enabling more effective budget allocation

employers.description: Led demand generation efforts through digital advertising and email marketing campaigns for a B2B technology company specializing in wireless collaboration solutions.
achievements: Developed integrated digital advertising strategy across search, display, and social media platforms to drive qualified leads
Optimized campaign targeting and messaging to improve engagement with key decision-makers in target industries
Collaborated with sales team to align marketing initiatives with sales objectives and improve lead quality

employers.title: Email Marketing Manager
employers.description: Managed email marketing strategy and execution, focusing on lead nurturing, customer engagement, and retention campaigns.
achievements: Implemented segmentation and personalization strategies that increased email open rates by 35% and click-through rates by 42%
Developed automated email workflows for lead nurturing, reducing sales cycle length by 22%
Created and optimized email templates and content to improve engagement and conversion rates

employers.title: Ecommerce Marketing Manager
employers.description: Led ecommerce marketing initiatives for an educational robotics company, focusing on driving online sales and customer acquisition.
achievements: Managed digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels to drive traffic and conversions to the ecommerce platform
Optimized product pages and checkout process to improve conversion rates
Implemented email marketing strategies to increase customer retention and lifetime value

employers.title: Sales and Marketing Operations Analyst
employers.description: Supported sales and marketing operations through data analysis, reporting, and process optimization.
achievements: Analyzed marketing campaign performance and provided actionable insights to improve ROI
Developed and maintained sales and marketing dashboards to track key performance indicators
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline lead management and sales processes

employers.title: Sales and Marketing Operations Manager
employers.description: Managed sales and marketing operations for a global payment processing company, focusing on process optimization and performance tracking.
achievements: Led implementation of CRM system to improve sales tracking and reporting capabilities
Developed and executed marketing campaigns to support sales initiatives
Created and maintained performance dashboards to track key metrics and identify areas for improvement

employers.title: Marketing Engineer
employers.description: Combined technical and marketing expertise to support product marketing initiatives for a payment processing software company.
achievements: Developed technical marketing materials to explain complex payment processing concepts to non-technical audiences
Supported customer onboarding and implementation processes
Collaborated with product and engineering teams to ensure marketing messaging aligned with product capabilities

employers.companyName: Big Brothers Big Sisters of Colorado
employers.title: Fund Development Vista
employers.description: Served as an AmeriCorps VISTA member supporting fund development initiatives for Big Brothers Big Sisters of Colorado.
achievements: Provided support for fundraising events and campaigns
Managed the Cars Helping Kids Program marketing and solicitation efforts
Conducted research on target populations to improve outreach and engagement strategies

employers.title: Administrative Fellow
employers.description: Served as an administrative fellow supporting the organization's mission to revitalize the federal government.
achievements: Provided administrative support for various programs and initiatives
Assisted with research and data collection projects
Supported event planning and execution

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Business Administration
education.activities: American Marketing Association, American Finance Association

bio: I graduated in 2008 from Central Michigan University during the start of the great recession with a degree in Finance. Needless to say, not many people were looking for finance new grads, so I spent a year with Americorps VISTA and worked at Big Brothers Big Sisters of Colorado. From there I became interested in digital marketing, data and analytics and have grown into a seasoned digital marketing professional.
